title: "Humanoid Robot CEO Is ‘On 24/7,’ Doesn’t Get Weekends Off"
excerpt: "The artificial intelligence-powered humanoid CEO of a European beverage company “doesn’t really have weekends,” opting for a seven-day workweek instead. Mika, the robot head of Dictador, revealed in an interview last week that she’s responsible for making round-the-clock executive decisions."
